cu.explanation_en: Setting the RRC log level to an unknown value 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration failure and potential system instability.

du.explanation_en: Setting CSIRS enable flag to a negative value will cause physical layer configuration validation error.
du.explanation_zh: 將 CSIRS 啟用旗標設定為負值會導致物理層配置驗證錯誤。
